title: Technician
body: .... -> Uhm, hello... <> No Time to talk! There is something evil coming for us! That would mean a mass extinction and a massive loss of knowledge. I can't let that happen! I don't know what it is, but a rocket has to be able to stop it. Right? -> Is there a way I can help? Probably not. Though I seem to have lost a power core, if you stumble upon it, that would help me greatly. <> No clue where I put it. I'm sure I had it a few days ago. <> -> I found your power core <> [[Technician.GiveCore]] <> It's a shame that rocket didn't hit, huh. All that's between us and certain doom is you and everything I can do now is get you in best shape. [[Technician.HealPlayer]] <> -> ... [[Technician.MorseJoke]]

title: Technician.HealPlayer
body:
Do you want me to take care of those dents?
-> Yes please.
    <<SetHP Player 7>>
    Here you go!
    Good luck protecting our knowledge
-> No, I actually like them.
    Whatever you say...
    Just be careful when you fight that thing.
    We can't risk loosing everything we know to it.

title: Technician.GiveCore
body:
OH
I honestly didn't expect you to find it.
Where did you even find that??
Anyways, with this I can finish building my rocket.
And.... Liftoff<<set $rocket to true>>
..........................................................
It missed??
That thing was my only hope to destroy the thing...
Hey.. you,
can you destroy the thing that's hiding up north.
Your chances of winning aren't the highest,
but think of the science that'd be lost!
In the meantime I can repair you.
[[Technician.HealPlayer]]
